snippet.title: Night Shift Nurses OP Movie #visualnovel
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3239270?utm_source=youtubeen

A washed-up mad doctor is hired back by a devious former test subject and asked to twist her hospital into a corrupt donation mill. Will he seize this second chance to practice his own vision of "science," or will his many failings drag him down once again in this pseudo-medical visual novel?

Subscribe & Follow Shiravune for our latest news:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/shiravune/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/shiravune
Discord: https://discord.gg/qBmrqDy
Website: https://shiravune.com/
